version_description: We hebben bugs gecorrigeerd om de app stabieler te maken. Nadat je de app hebt geüpdatet, verwachten we dat je een vlekkeloze ervaring hebt!

We’re continuously working on our app to make buying and selling tickets faster and easier. Update to the latest version to enjoy improvements!

What's new:
We removed the 'Discover' page so you can now browse events by artist, venue or city.

A faster, smoother, redesigned experience we're sure you'll notice immediately!

Search is now way faster and you'll see search results for events, venues & cities all in one list

We optimised the layout of our homepage for mobile to make it even easier to browse highlighted events or discover what's going on in your city

We'd love to hear your ideas and feedback via info@ticketswap.com

A faster, smoother, redesigned experience we're sure you'll notice immediately!

Search is now way faster and you'll see search results for events, venues & cities all in one list

We optimised the layout of our homepage for mobile to make it even easier to browse highlighted events or discover what's going on in your city

We'd love to hear your ideas and feedback via info@ticketswap.com

New in 'Home' screen
- Tabs to easily navigate between different cities
- New Spotlight: "Take a trip": see what's happening abroad
- New Spotlight: "Amazing festivals": discover festivals worldwide

New in 'Artist' screen
- The "nearby" section reveals an artist's upcoming events close to you

New in 'City' screen
- We've highlighted the best events that the city has to offer
- Category tabs to filter by club nights, concerts, festivals, sports events, theatre and days out

We’re ready for iOS11!
It’s now easier than ever to select your tickets and put them up for sale, thanks to iOS11’s new file sharing features!

Before, we used to show the ticket price a seller set at a listing. As of today, we'll also include and show the service fee of 5% in this price. By showing the displayed price in this format will make it clearer for potential buyers.
Fixed a little bug - that’s it! We hope you enjoy the app.

- We've added some featured groups on the homepage, tailored to your location. If you're in the Netherlands check out our Amsterdam Dance Event group, or if you're in the UK check out our Halloween parties.
- Bug fixes and stability

This is what’s new:
- You can now upload tickets with a single tap, scan your mailbox (Gmail, Outlook, Hotmail) for tickets and upload them right away
- TicketSwap App is now available in Polish!
- Upload PKPass directly from your Wallet
- We’ve fixed some date/time issues when viewing international events
- Some bug fixes and stability improvements
- bug fixes and stability improvements

Here's what's new in version 3.4:
- We’ve simplified our pricing. Click the “fees” text below the ticket price to see how prices are calculated
- We’ve updated our terms and conditions and privacy policy

Here's what's new in version 3.5:
- You can now sign up and use TicketSwap without Facebook
- Some bug fixes and stability improvements

Hi there, we've got some a new and exciting feature in this update:

+ We redesigned the "My Account"-tab of our app. You can now access all your account info and settings much easier and have an even better experience!
+ As always, some bug fixes and general improvements.

Love the app? Don't forget to rate us! We love hearing your feedback. Let us know what you think. In the app, visit: Account -> Contact.

- We've swept up some bugs, making things run more smoothly.

We're delighted to bring you a brand new version of our app!
Our team has been working hard to bring you some exciting new features that we can't wait to share with you:

- Create a new account very quickly and safely with Apple ID.
- Receive and view all important messages (postponed events, refunds) directly in your profile and with push notifications.
- Our app looks better than ever in dark mode!

Plus tons of other enhancements & fixes under the hood, plus foundations for secret new features!

We're delighted to bring you a brand new version of our app!
Our team has been working hard to bring you some exciting new features that we can't wait to share with you:

- Create a new account very quickly and safely with Apple ID.
- Receive and view all important messages (postponed events, refunds) directly in your profile and with push notifications.
- Our app looks better than ever in dark mode!

Plus tons of other enhancements & fixes under the hood, plus foundations for secret new features!

We can't wait to see our favourite bands live when concerts start again. If you're feeling the same, you'll be happy to see that you can now use TicketSwap to search for artists, follow them and be notified when they're on tour!
We'll also suggest new artists that you'll love so you can always discover new music.

Great news! You can now buy and sell groups of tickets on TicketSwap! This means that you can buy or sell tickets for corona proof events, where you book a table as a group.

Ciao! Along with the usual bug fixes and improvements under the hood, we're happy to expand to Italy!

Concerts are better with friends and sharing your tickets with them is now easier than ever. Send them a link, they accept, and that’s it!
And you can now add events to your calendar in just one tap.
Bug fixes and improvements
